CustomField.formula: ordexp_Total_OLI_Net_Amount__c - IF(OR( Deal__r.Name ='1512', Deal__r.Name ='3070', Deal__r.Name ='3065', Deal__r.Name ='3078',Deal__r.Name ='1884', Deal__r.Name ='1893', Deal__r.Name ='3304'), 299, IF(Deal__r.Name ='1735',399, IF( OR(Deal__r.Name ='3368', Deal__r.Name ='3108', Deal__r.Name ='3133' ), 199,499) )) * PAX_Qty__c
CustomField.label: POM Credit Amount
